segments.text: My attention is drawn to the young boy attempting to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is standing on a small two-step stool positioned in front of a counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed outwards, making it look incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be tilted backwards, almost ready to tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far upwards, his body is fully extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool gives way, he could fall hard onto the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me incredibly nervous just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't anyone see the danger he's in right now?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to this immediate hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily hit his head or break a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would intervene and secure that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's irresponsible for such a precarious setup to go unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
